name: The Guardian (Tora)
description:
The  Guardian

Extension work for MSU game development and design Specialization course on Coursera.

Changes Added:

  1. Design Modifications:
    1. Designed complete different game and story, using new mechanics and visuals.
    2. Designed Two different Levels with their story.
    3. Designed and implemented a Fully functional generic dialogue system, where each sentence of the dialogue has (Name, Text, Event fired after sentence).
    4. Designed and implemented Fog in the screen using a shader.
  1. Aesthetic Modifications:
    1. Used Whole different UI assets from the assets store.
    2. Used Whole different Characters and their animation from the assets store.
    3. Used Whole different tiles and visuals from the assets store.
    4. Used Whole different sounds for SFX and Game loop
  1. Gameplay Modifications:
    1. Implemented Slide mechanics for the player.
    2. Implemented Interactable Objects for the player to interact with.
    3. Implemented Push Objects for the player to Push and use to cross different platforms.
